thread.title: Lord Livingstone launched into outer space
thread.title_full: Lord Livingstone launched into outer space

author: Deccan
title: Lord Livingstone launched into outer space
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 01, 2015, 00.24 am The space launch of the film Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi, written and directed by Anil Radhakrishna Menon was successfully launched in the cool climes of Munnar recently by actor Sunny Wayne. The Helium balloon carrying the Go Pro camera recorded the entire upward journey accompanied by the trailer of the film on a small LED screen.
The balloon burst once it reached the stratosphere launching a parachute that guided it back to earth within a 100 kilometer radius. Present on the occasion were the producer Prem Menon, the sound designer as well as actor Divyadarshan.
